question: Which of the following cities is the correct location of Microbial Type Culture Collection and Gene Bank (MTCC)?
explanation: The Microbial Type Culture Collection and Gene Bank (MTCC), a national facility established in 1986. The MTCC is housed at the Institute of Microbial Technology (IMTECH), Chandigarh, has established itself as a distinguished culture collection centre for microbial resources in India.
